title: Saturday Studio: Radical Typographies
short_description: Looking to Dan Friedman: Stay Radical for typography inspiration, pick up a pencil and begin drawing your own letter type.
list_description: Looking to Dan Friedman: Stay Radical for typography inspiration, pick up a pencil and begin drawing your own letter type.
description:
In the first of two Saturday Studio programs inspired by the multi-faceted practice of Dan Friedman, pick up a pencil and design your own letter type. The goal for this session is to begin by looking at letter designs that excite you, and end by creating at least one letter or character that is your own. 

Showcased in the Architecture & Design exhibition Dan Friedman: Stay Radical, Friedman's multidisciplinary practice included posters, books, mixed-media assemblages, and furniture. Join us in October to take a page from Friedman's posters, experimenting with color and shape as the basis for composing a dynamic image.

Please note that this is an in-person event that takes place at the museum.

In accordance with state and City of Chicago guidelines, visitors to the museum are no longer required to wear masks or provide proof of vaccination. Anyone who would like to continue to wear a mask is welcome to do so. Learn more about our visiting policies and what to expect.

If you have any questions about programming, please reach out to museum-programs@artic.edu.
